statements: SELECT * FROM classic_car_restoration_expenses WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, expense_amount FROM classic_car_restoration_expenses WHERE expense_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM classic_car_restoration_expenses WHERE expense_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM classic_car_restoration_expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, expense_description FROM classic_car_restoration_expenses WHERE expense_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT * FROM classic_car_restoration_expenses WHERE project_id = 1 ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT project_name, expense_amount FROM classic_car_restoration_expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, expense_amount FROM classic_car_restoration_expenses WHERE expense_description LIKE '%paint%';
SELECT project_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM classic_car_restoration_expenses GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT project_id, project_name, expense_amount FROM classic_car_restoration_expenses ORDER BY expense_date ASC, project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, total_cost FROM Project WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, total_cost FROM Project WHERE total_cost > 10000 ORDER BY total_cost ASC;
SELECT project_id, SUM(cost) AS total_expenses FROM Expense GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_expenses > 5000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, total_cost FROM Project WHERE total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, total_cost FROM Project WHERE total_cost < 5000 ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, total_cost FROM Project WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM Expense WHERE cost > 500 ORDER BY category ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT e.expense_id, e.expense_date, e.category, e.cost, p.project_name FROM Expense e INNER JOIN Project p ON e.project_id = p.project_id;
SELECT * FROM ClassicCarOwners;
SELECT name, email FROM ClassicCarOwners WHERE id = '1';
SELECT project_id, car_make, car_model FROM RestorationProjects ORDER BY car_make DESC;
SELECT * FROM Expenses WHERE expense_amount > 500;
SELECT project_id, expense_description, expense_amount FROM Expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM ClassicCarOwners ORDER BY name DESC, email ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, email FROM ClassicCarOwners WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_id, car_make, start_date FROM RestorationProjects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT project_id, car_make, car_model, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expense FROM RestorationProjects JOIN Expenses ON RestorationProjects.project_id = Expenses.project_id GROUP BY project_id ORDER BY total_expense DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT c.id, c.name AS owner_name, p.car_make, e.expense_description FROM ClassicCarOwners c JOIN RestorationProjects p ON c.id = p.project_id JOIN Expenses e ON p.project_id = e.project_id WHERE p.car_make = 'Chevrolet' AND e.expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY e.expense_amount ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM CarOwners WHERE owner_id = 1
SELECT owner_name, car_model FROM CarOwners ORDER BY owner_name ASC
SELECT purchase_date, purchase_price FROM CarOwners WHERE purchase_price > 50000
SELECT car_model, owner_name FROM CarOwners WHERE owner_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT AVG(purchase_price) AS avg_price FROM CarOwners
SELECT owner_name, car_model, purchase_date, purchase_price FROM CarOwners
SELECT part_name, part_type, part_price, quantity FROM PartsInventory ORDER BY part_price DESC
SELECT DISTINCT owner_name, car_model FROM CarOwners WHERE purchase_price > 20000
SELECT * FROM Expenses WHERE expense_type = 'maintenance' ORDER BY expense_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT owner_name, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM Revenue GROUP BY owner_name HAVING total_revenue > 5000
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM project WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT id, project_name, end_date FROM project ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, unit_price FROM materials WHERE unit_price < 50;
SELECT worker_name, rate, hours_worked FROM labor ORDER BY rate DESC, hours_worked ASC;
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT p.project_name, SUM(e.amount) AS total_expenses FROM project p JOIN expenses e ON p.id = e.project_id GROUP BY p.project_name HAVING total_expenses > 10000;
SELECT * FROM labor WHERE hours_worked > 40 AND rate < 20 ORDER BY project_id, worker_name ASC;
SELECT pr.project_name, pr.start_date, l.worker_name, l.hours_worked FROM project pr JOIN labor l ON pr.id = l.project_id WHERE pr.budget < 10000 ORDER BY l.hours_worked DESC;
